body: Gotta love the loyalty though ong. Haven't read any of the other chapters so this is from that perspective of it.
This is literally rape + NTR when the other 3 chapters are wholesome tsundere actions.... WTF...
WHY THE FUCK WOULD YOU DO THIS TO US YOU BACK STABBING HEART BREAKING, SOUL CRUSHING BASTARD!!!!!!! SHE WAS SO PURE AND CUTE AND YOU HAD TO VIOLATE EVERYTHING ABOUT HER LIKE THIS?!?!?!?? FUCKING HELL
this is a horrible story to this series
Hmm... I have mix feelings about this one...
